Python module for generating objects that compute the Cyclic Redundancy
Check (CRC)
dependencies.name: py-crcmod

dependencies.description: A python package that provides useful locks.
dependencies.name: py-fasteners

dependencies.description:
Auth plugin allowing use the use of OAuth 2.0 credentials for Google
Cloud Storage in the Boto library.
dependencies.name: py-gcs-oauth2-boto-plugin

dependencies.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.
dependencies.name: py-google-auth

dependencies.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.
dependencies.name: py-mock

dependencies.description: An implementation of time.monotonic() for Python 2 & < 3.3
dependencies.name: py-monotonic

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.
dependencies.name: py-pyopenssl

dependencies.description: Decorator for retrying when exceptions occur
dependencies.name: py-retry-decorator

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.
dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe

description: A command line tool for interacting with cloud storage services.
name: py-gsutil
